name: mabl-azure-devops-extension
description: Run your mabl tests in your Azure DevOps pipelines
author: mabl

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API key
inputs.helpMarkDown: A mabl API key obtained from the mabl app settings/API page

inputs.name: applicationId
inputs.label: Application ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the application you'd like to run tests against

inputs.name: environmentId
inputs.label: Environment ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: A mabl API key obtained from the mabl app settings/API page

inputs.name: continueOnPlanFailure
inputs.label: Continue on plan failure
inputs.helpMarkDown: Continue the build/release pipeline even if a plan fails

inputs.name: continueOnMablApiFailure
inputs.label: Continue on mabl API failure
inputs.helpMarkDown: Continue the build/release pipeline even if unable to talk to the mabl API
